definition: surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
Gasol (name)/Pau Gasol (1980-), Spanish professional basketball player (NBA)/Marc Gasol (1985-), Spanish professional basketball player (NBA)
Modest Mussorgsky (1839-1881), Russian composer, composer of Pictures at an Exhibition
Alexandr Solzhenitsyn (1918-2008), Russian writer, prominent Soviet dissident, author of the Gulag Archipelago

pinyin: Suo3 er3 zi1 bo2 li3 ping2 yuan2
Suo3 er3 zi1 bo2 li3 shi2 huan2

sentences.english: We got to train with Ole Gunnar Solskjaer and that was really fun and he was really friendly.
sentences.chinese: 我們在索爾斯克亞的指導下訓練，這很有意思。

sentences.english: How are Lakers fans supposed to interpret these comments?
sentences.chinese: 湖人球迷應當這麼解讀加索爾的表態呢？

sentences.english: Saldana also confirmed that shooting will begin early next year.
sentences.chinese: 索爾達娜還說續集將於明年初開拍。

sentences.english: But make no mistake; Gasol and Bryant are totally geeked about the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 了，加索爾和科比在奧林匹克運動會上完全沒經驗。

sentences.english: Mysore sandalwood oil was renowned and considered superior to all other varieties.
sentences.chinese: 邁索爾檀香油是著名的，並認爲優於其他所有品種。

sentences.english: Earlier this year, we undertook a similar exercise in Salford.
sentences.chinese: 今年初，我們在索爾福德進行了同樣的調查。

sentences.english: Do you put Lamar on him or Gasol?
sentences.chinese: 讓拉瑪爾或加索爾防他？

sentences.english: "People are entitled to express their views in whichever way they wish," Salt said.
sentences.chinese: “人們有權表達他們的意見，”索爾特聲稱。

sentences.english: Mr. Solzhenitsyn was not the first to write about the camps.
sentences.chinese: 索爾仁尼琴並非第一位寫集中營題材的作家。

sentences.english: This time around we’re staying at the Hotel Del Sol in the Marina.
sentences.chinese: 這次我們呆在舊金山灣的德爾索爾旅館。

sentences.english: I'm doing my coaching badges now with Ole Gunnar Solskjaer and Giggsy.
sentences.chinese: 目前我正與索爾斯克亞和吉格斯在考取教練證書。

sentences.english: He said his name was Saul of Tarsus .
sentences.chinese: 他說，他的名字被索爾貝趺。

sentences.english: What sculpture is to a block of marble, education is to the soule.
sentences.chinese: 猶如雕刻之於大理石塊，教育是對索爾。

sentences.english: So what did Chessor do with those cotton swabs?
sentences.chinese: 那麼切索爾老太太拿那些棉籤怎麼辦了？

sentences.english: For a time, the Soviet government tolerated Solzhenitsyn.
sentences.chinese: 一開始，蘇聯當局對索爾仁尼琴採取寬容的態度。

sentences.english: Salisbury promised, however, to review the data.
sentences.chinese: 不過，索爾茲伯裏承諾會評估疫苗資料。

definition: Dole (name)/Bob Dole (1923-), US Republican politician, Kansas senator 1969-1996
variant of 邱吉爾|邱吉尔[Qiu1 ji2 er3]
Milton (name)/John Milton (1608-1674), English republican writer and poet, author of Paradise Lost
Michel or Mitchell (name)/George Mitchell (1933-), US Democratic party politician and diplomat, influential in brokering Northern Ireland peace deal in 1990s, US Middle East special envoy from 2009
Werther, opera by Jules Massenet/Werther, German masculine given name
